entry.def: If you say that someone has been thrown on the scrapheap, you mean that they have been forced to leave their job by an uncaring employer and are unlikely to get other work.

example.ex: Miners have been thrown on the scrapheap with no prospects.
example.tran: 大批矿工被解雇，工作没着落。

entry.def: If things such as machines or weapons are thrown on the scrapheap, they are thrown away because they are no longer needed.

example.ex: Thousands of Europe's tanks and guns are going to the scrap heap.
example.tran: 欧洲成千上万的坦克和枪支将被淘汰。

means.word_mean: 1. an accumulation of refuse and discarded matter
